original_text: When you built your mounds at every street corner and made your lofty shrines in every public square, you were unlike a prostitute, because you scorned payment.
korean_text: 네가 누각을 모든 길 어귀에 건축하며 높은 대를 모든 거리에 쌓고도 값을 싫어하니 창기 같지도 아니하도다

sentences.original_text: When you built your mounds at every street corner
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 모든 길모퉁이에 네 높은 곳을 쌓을 때에

sentences.original_text: and made your lofty shrines in every public square
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 넓은 곳에 네 아름다운 높은 곳을 세웠으나
